title: How to create a pbe account?
body:
My question is how to create a pbe account, since it has been giving me errors in the page. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} 

Thanks.

replies.body: If you're getting errors then you might be logged into the wrong account or using a wrong url.  Log off completely, then make sure you are signing in to the [NA League of Legends](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe) website.  You should be able to sign up from there.  If that doesn't work, try another browser as well.  I hope that helps!
POROCLES u can change not play ranked 10 match.im so weak for play ranked.i want going PBE not play ranked 10 match game
I tried it but it appears: error 500. And i tried it in google chrome and internet explorer{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
How can I have a pbe account?
